name: Encryption or Wiping in Progress – Qualification
description:
# 🔒 Encryption or Wiping in Progress – Qualification

---

## 🎯 Usage

Qualify a **ransomware-type** attack in order to:

* Confirm the incident
* Define its scope
* Estimate impact and urgency

---

### ⚙️ Prerequisites

* 🔑 Administration, security, and IS monitoring access
* 📝 Knowledge of business priorities and emergency contacts
* 👥 Ability to mobilize the managed service provider if needed
* ✅ Actions already taken identified and logged

---

## 📌 Objectives

1. Confirm the ransomware incident
2. Assess the affected scope
3. Measure the incident’s impact
4. Determine the urgency of resolution

---

## 📄 Resource

👉 [Full reflex sheet – PDF](https://www.intercert-france.fr/wp-content/uploads/2025/06/fichereflexe-chiffrement-qualification.pdf)

tasks.title: Measure 1 – Confirm the ransomware incident
tasks.description:
### 🎯 Objective

Validate that this is a **ransomware/wiping** incident.

### 📌 Actions

* Strong signals: AV/EDR detection, ransom pop-up, abnormal extensions, mass archive creation
* Weak signals: multiple outages, EDR disabled, suspicious exfiltration

### ✅ Deliverables

* Confirmation conclusion
* Add an **activity** to this task for incident confirmation

tasks.title: Measure 2 – Assess the scope
tasks.description:
### 🎯 Objective

Identify affected areas/systems and **accounts**.

### 📌 Actions

* Identify the role of encrypted machines
  → Workstations? Application servers? Storage servers? Virtual machines? Physical machines?
* Identify level of compromise (workstations, AD, hypervisors)
* Assess extent of compromise (zones)
* Identify risks to interconnected systems

### ✅ Deliverables

* Estimated scope
* Scope documented in the **activities** of this task
* Identified **observables** recorded

tasks.title: Measure 3 – Assess the impact
tasks.description:
### 🎯 Objective

Qualify the **vital activities** disrupted.

### 📌 Actions

* Assess impacts on business activity
* Assess regulatory impacts
* Assess impacts on business continuity
* Assess impacts of containment actions

### ✅ Deliverables

* Impact assessed
* Impact documented in the **activities** of this task

tasks.title: Measure 4 – Assess urgency
tasks.description:
### 🎯 Objective

Prioritize the recovery process.

### 📌 Actions

* Is there an existing continuity procedure in normal or degraded mode?
* Are these procedures active, and for how long?
* Are restoration actions already in progress?
* Which vital activities are stopped and require immediate recovery?
* Which vital activities are in degraded mode and require recovery preparation?

### ✅ Deliverables

* Urgency determined
* Prioritization steps added to the **activities** of this task
